name: Ace of Spades Forums - Dark & Simple
description:
Revamps the Ace of Spades Forums with a sleek, dark interface combined with a few tweaks and improvements such as:

• Easier on the eyes
• Pretty minimalistic
• Topic page numbers are separated farther for easier navigation
• Larger textbox when posting
additional_info:
Change Log:

V1.0.7
- Fixed apperence of <pre> tags ("backticks")
v1.0.6
- Set minimum height for posting/replying textarea
- Fixed bug with textarea for posting/replying not being able to be resized
v1.0.5
- "Topics with no tags"/"Topics with no replies" are now in distinct tables
- Changed height of textarea for posting/replying to fixed size
v1.0.4
- "Last post by" text under stickies now matches color scheme
- "Topics with no tags"/"Topics with no replies" lists centered and more readable
- Removed empty table at bottom of front page
v1.0.3
- Thinned out user controls and forum controls
- Fixed font above tag field when posting a new thread
- Made post information ("Allowed markup") more readable
- User controls (search/favorites/etc) and forum controls (stats/topics without replies/etc) are now centered
- Normal links no longer have dotted underlining
- Tag no longer fade when hovered over
- Tags are now a consistent size
v1.0.2
- Drop-down lists now match color scheme
- Buttons now match color scheme
- Textboxes now match color scheme
v1.0.1
- Textareas now match color scheme
v1.0
- Initial release
